name: parede-forro-delivery-site
description: Site da Parede & Forro Delivery - Soluções em Drywall e Gesso Acartonado

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:copy && npm run build:optimize
scripts.build:copy: powershell -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path dist; Copy-Item -Path index.html,assets,public -Destination dist -Recurse -Force"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx netlify deploy --prod --dir=dist

author: Parede & Forro Delivery
